name: Ghost Weightless Shampoo for Fine Hair
about: What it is:u00a0A moringa oil-infused shampoo that weightlessly cleanses fine and easily weighed down hair...Hair Texture:u00a0Straight, Wavy, and Curly..Hair Type:u00a0Fine and Medium..Hair Concerns:.- Dryness.- Frizz.- Shine..Formulation:u00a0Lightweight Lotion..Fragrance Type:u00a0Citrus and Woods..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Moringa Seed Oil: Moisturizes, detangles, and smooths hair..- Quinoa Protein: Repairs damage while coating, strengthening and protecting hair; packed with vitamins and minerals as well as amino acids, it aids in hair growth while preventing breakage..- Sunflower Seed Extract: Provides natural UV protection while guarding against dryness, color fading, and brassiness...Ingredient Callouts:u00a0Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, and mineral oil. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free. It comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know:u00a0This gentle shampoo is formulated with moringa seed oil to naturally smooth frizz and promote radiant shine for all hair types. Sunflower seed extract provides natural UV protection while guarding against color fading as quinoa protein strengthens, protects, and encourages hair growth. A hint of grapefruit and oatmeal blend together to leave hair with a light, fresh fragrance.

The thing I liked most was how when my hair finished drying, my scalp didn't feel tight, dry, or itchy. It just felt normal.  I do have to say that there isn't super significant results when it comes to how your hair looks. It just makes my hair feel lighter and balanced. reviews.review_text: I have mixed feelings about this shampoo and conditioner. Got both in the standard size a couple of months ago. At first, I really liked it, but I didn't love it. It didn't leave my hair as dry as some other shampoos do, and the conditioner made them feel smoother without adding more weight, even while still in a shower. These days, I wash my hair a couple of times a week, so I expected that this stay-at-home regiment would help my strands heal. I have fine curly hair that I used to straighten daily with a dryer and sometimes iron until relatively recently. What happened with this set, however, is that I started having dandruff after about a month. I had never had dandruff in my life before! It also seems that I'm losing more hair than I used to. Despite using a decent amount of conditioner, I can barely brush my wet hair. And if I don't brush when it's still wet, I may not be able to brush it at all. This is despite using the Ghost oil (that I generally like) and Moroccan Oil leave-in conditioner for my ends. I was attributing these issues to the general stress and cold weather but as I read negative reviews, I thought of other brands that I liked at the beginning and then started to like less, and it was the opposite problem: they made my hair greasy after two bottles, but at the beginning, they moisturized and conditioned perfectly. reviews.review_text: I have fine hair, but a LOT of them and they are curly/frizzy. I tried this shampoo and all it did was make my hair dry and hard to style. My hair is usually silky smooth and voluminous... Not with verb.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the only sulfate-free shampoos that can handle styling product build-up on my thick, wavy hair.

reviews.review_title: For soft, weightless and healthy hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine, oily, colour treated hair and always have issues with my hair looking dry but greasy at the same time (if that makes sense). I used the sample of this product ONCE and I had a lady ask if my hair was real cause it looked so shiny and healthy. My hair feels weightless, soft and it actually blow dried in less time than it normally does. I am purchasing the full size one immediately!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample set, used it a few times, and immediately had to purchase. Iu2019ve bought the ghost shampoo, conditioner and oil as well as the hydrating mask. Iu2019ve received nothing but compliments about the way my hair smells, looks, and how it feels by a few loved ones. I personally havenu2019t been able to stop touching it, it literally feels like silk! Completely weightless. I have fire truck red hair, itu2019s been damaged by years of colouring, however itu2019s still in pretty good shape and this brings out my hairu2019s best qualities. I canu2019t say anything about how reparative it is on highly damaged hair as Iu2019ve only used it for a few months. Iu2019ve also noticed I have to wash my hair a lot less, I always go at least a week between hair washing and by the time the week is up, my hair still isnu2019t greasy. Amazing. I love this so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved the shampoo and conditioner as a sample. I didn't look up either of the products before putting them to the test. I have fine, straight hair and oily scalp. As a result various shampoo/conditioners give an initial impression of doing a decent job, however an hour after drying my hair and styling (usually leaving it down) the hair looks terrible and my scalp is super oily.   Thankfully that didn't happen with this product! I did my hair as a usually do and I got compliments on how nice my hair looked, day two my hair still looked good! Overall, I'm happy with this product and will likely purchase a bottle in the near future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite shampoo for my Asian hair and scalpu2014 lots of hair, but very fine, and my scalp tends toward oily. Moisture has never been a problem for my hair, but limpness, volume-less-neas, and oil have. This leaves my hair clean but smooth and SUPER silky. My hair is naturally shiny, and somehow, this keeps it that way while keeping it from getting greasy. Iu2019ve tried Briogeo shampoo/conditioners, Living Proof, Pantene, Herbal Essences, Aveeno Rosemary, Dove, Head and Shoulders, Bumble and Bumble... this is by far the best for my hair.   If Iu2019m going to be SUPER picky, Iu2019d complain that the smell sort of reminds me of cheap motel shampoo... but itu2019s a light scent and certainly not enough to make me stop using it or knock off a star.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo is pretty solid. It isnu2019t perfect, and I have to wash my hair every two days when using it instead of the three I was able to do with another product. At first I experienced a small amount of dandruff, but after a couple weeks of use that stopped. With those two things aside, though, my baby-fine hair is soft, shiny, and retains moisture without being weighed down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine, type 2b hair and this worked great on my hair and so did the matching conditioner! I was surprised that I liked it so much because I had tried one of their other products that I didnu2019t end up liking so much, but the Ghost collection left my hair soft, manageable, and with plenty of volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely thin hair! I have dyed my hair several times and have had dreads, I also have a lot of fall out. After using this shampoo the fall out has stopped which is amazing. My hair looks fuller and shine. If you're looking for a shampoo for a nice scent, this aint it sis. This smells like light lemon which is fine by me. Overall, great shampoo have not tried the conditioner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo (and conditioner) were recommended to me by a friend who's hair looks really healthy and shiny most days. Initially I liked it, as I've been struggling with hair fall due to stress and this seemed to decrease the amount of hair I was losing each time I washed it. However, the more I use it, the more I dislike it. It makes my hair full of static, ends look more frizzy, and it gets oilier by the second day than when I use other shampoo and conditioners. The scent is just ok. Won't be repurchasing again.  For comparison, I have thicker, 2b, medium length hair and a normal scalp (not dry, not oily). I use a titanium-based straightener most days with my usual heat protectant. If my hair was thinner and drier, I think the static issue would be even worse with this. Which is weird, because it's marketed to thin hair types. It's not because the weather is getting colder and drier either, as I started using this in September when it was still warm, and I sometimes switch with a different shampoo and conditioner and my hair isn't staticy then.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo lathers really well. Every time I use this shampoo I feel like my hair gets really clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First couple washes were good. But, there are better products then this shampoo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very happy with it. Hopefully I will feel the same in a month from now. Adds volume, my hair is thinning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I mean the shampoo is ok, but use the conditioner with it and you get so much buildup in your hair. I mean you can buy it if you want to waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this! I thought I wouldnu2019t because of the bad reviews but my oily fine hair loved it! Itu2019s super shiny and healthy feeling right now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this shampoo gave me volume and left my hair very clean, however I didnu2019t like the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got Verb Ghost Conditioner and Shampoo as a sample with one of my orders. My hair is wavy and really frizzy, I have issues with scalp dryness. The first couple of times I used the product, it worked really good, my hair felt clean and it was not as frizzy so I decided to order the 12/oz for both Shampoo and Conditioner. Within a week of using it my hear was completely dead dull and frizzy like never before, I'm not sure what happened but it damaged my hair terribly, it was nothing like the samples and it was super disappointing, I tried to give it more time, thinking it would get better, but after 3 weeks of use, I decided to return both products. It was a horrible product for my hair.
Worst shampoo Iu2019ve used - far below any drugstore product. Makes your hair fall out and oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has brought my long, thin, and wavy hair back to LIFE! Iu2019ve used many Shampoos and Conditioners searching for my holy grail.. the search is over. Will be buying this forever. Pairs perfect with the Ghost Prep and Ghost oil after showering. My hair is bouncy and so soft again for the first time in many years! Does not weigh my fine hair down at all! LOVE!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best shampoo I have ever had! I have really thin hair and it makes my hair super soft and voluminous. It also helps with frizz. Would highly recommend, at least for those with thin hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased with my own money - Been using this for about a month and I really like it! I have very fine, thin hair, and what I was using before (drugstore) was weighing my hair down. This cleans my quick-to-grease hair great and even gives me volume. I have weird straight/wavy/slightly curly hair and I notice since my hair isn't being weighed down anymore, more of my natural curls are forming which is so fun!   Doesn't really have a scent. Just a basic shampoo smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells nice and is nice to have on hand to refresh your hair once a week or so, but didnu2019t find that this was a game changer for my fine, thick, oily scalp. For the price it was worth trying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo was okay and I used it until I ran out, but it wasn't any different from a cheaper drugstore shampoo for me. I had to use more product than I normally use for my hair to feel clean otherwise my hair would start to feel oily again by the end of the day or the following day. The smell was nice and not overpowering, but faded quickly and could be stronger. Overall I expected better results due to the price and will stick to other shampoos I've purchased from Sephora that wowed me and the cost felt worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this along with the conditioner for a month now. I had high hopes as my hair is super fine but thereu2019s a lot of it and wanted something that left my hair with volume. This shampoo simply didnu2019t work, my hair would be extremely greasy by the end of the day, it made my scalp itchy and I now have dandruff which Iu2019ve never had in my life. Also my hair is chemically lightened, and I have had extreme hair loss and breakage after using this shampoo... my baby hairs are singed right off. Honestly it didnu2019t even give me more volume so it was not worth it one bit.

reviews.review_title: If skin care was this easy~
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If only skin care was as easy as hair care with Verb. I have tried 100s of poos/cond and every single one has been blah. This line, is hands down the best I have tried I love my hair again lol. Its light enough that it makes my fine hair have volume and hydrating enough to make it soft pair it with Ghost Oil and done! LOVE LOVE LOVE

reviews.review_title: Nice! Maybe not ideal for dyed hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this shampoo, the smell and the lather are pretty nice and my hair feels healthy. I will say though I do have colorful dyed hair and I feel like it's been fading waaay faster than usual with this so maybe if you have a fashion color this may not be the best option even though it does say color safe

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Cleanses super well without feeling dry or causing a tangled mess. I find the smell pleasant. This is my go to daily shampoo.

reviews.review_title: Great daily shampoo for fine hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeously thick lathering shampoo with subtle moisture for fine-haired folks who wash daily.  Combined with the Ghost Conditioner, my ultra-long, unprocessed, thick & wavy hair is super soft without sacrificing all desired volume.  To encourage my natural waves/curls & discourage frizz, I air dry my hair with a splash of Shu Uemurau2019s Kaze Wave mousse after some time in the Aquis turban.  My hair ends up with nice, soft waves.   If you want REAL volume with Verb .. then the Volume Shampoo & Conditioner are your best bet. Same air dry protocol with Shu Uemura Kaze Wave mousse & Aquis turban gives me MUCH more defined waves & curls with fantastic volume at the roots.

reviews.review_title: Great low-lather shampoo, not drying, smells fab
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got samples of the Ghost Shampoo and Conditioner with a previous order, and after a couple of weeks of use, I have to say I'm loving this line so far! They smell amazing, light and citrusy, and I appreciate that the shampoo lathers a bit but not to excess and doesn't feel drying. I don't think my hair is necessarily easier to detangle in the shower than with any other shampoo I've used, but it is easy to brush out after using the Ghost shampoo and conditioner together.   I have fine, platinum-blonde wavy hair that is prone to dryness and frizz on the ends and greasiness at the scalp, and it looks great, feels very soft, and smells lemony and amazing after using the Ghost line. My hair doesn't feel weighed down at all. While it doesn't prevent my roots from getting greasiness after a day or so, it certainly doesn't feel any oilier than before. I don't hold this against the product because a) my roots have always been prone to greasiness and b) I work out a lot, so good luck holding that at bay.  I just bought the shampoo and conditioner in the full size and will probably do the same with the Ghost Oil. Really loving this combination so far. I'm just bummed Sephora no longer seems to carry the value set with the big sizes of the shampoo and conditioner and free Ghost Oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo smells like a mix of baby shampoo and dish soap-not good. If it wasnu2019t for the smell Iu2019d give it a higher rating because it did leave my hair light and airy which was nice. I just can not get over the awful scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This brand especially the Ghost line has honestly amazed me. My hair has been going through a lot here lately since coming off birth-control pills. It started to fall out like crazy and my scalp has started itching and burning and itu2019s been a horrible situation. So Iu2019ve been trying to find a brand that can help me out and until now nothing has worked. Not Kerastase not Oribe not any of the high end brands. But when I received a sample of this  from Sephora with a purchase I honestly didnu2019t expect much. Letu2019s face it. The packaging looked blah and the price was on the cheaper end so I was thinking this isnu2019t going to be something Iu2019m going to like but omg I was wrong. It is the best I have tried for all my hair issues!!! It lathers wonderful and the smell is very light and it detangles like a champ. My hair has started shedding slightly less and it donu2019t aggravate my scalp. I have now purchased the whole line !! As the saying goes donu2019t judge a book by its cover cause honestly I was about to give this sample away cause it didnu2019t interest me. So glad I tried it. My wallet is happier which makes my husband happier and my hair is happier. So win win in my book.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't write reviews normally. Not at all. And the only reason I was shopping for shampoos from sephora is because of their return policy. A lil background, I've been on hunt for changing shampoos all summer due to intense hair fall and hair thinning all the while having dry hair but an oily scalp. I've tried 8 different shampoos and nothing worked. I didn't have high hopes when I ordered the pair but I still give it a try based on the reviews here. I kid you not. THIS WORKS. (knock on wood) I have seen less hair fall while brushing and otherwise. It's not gone and can never be gone like that. But it's LESS. My hair has volume. My scalp isn't oily. I can go easily without shampooing for a day now. And for some the shampoo may seem drying but use their conditioner. I've been using it for 3 weeks now. This is God sent for people with fine hair type. It's like someone listened to our pains and made a potion to solve it. May they never ever change this formula!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: City hard water is what I deal with and finding something that works has been a battle.  So far this shampoo has been awesome. my hair is washed apx every 4 days.  I can use this alone or mixed with another shampoo (tried the bright blonde highlights so I use a purple shampoo as well). Super light fragrance- so far so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have finally found my all time favorite shampoo (and conditioner). I have thick, somewhat coarse, long straight hair - SO MUCH hair. And it gets greasy ridiculously fast. Normally if I wash my hair in the morning it will be greasy by nighttime. I previously was using Drunk Elephant shampoo which seemed to do a decent job, but this blows it out of the water. My hair feels cleansed but still moisturized and very manageable. When used with the conditioner itu2019s a match made in Heaven. My hair is colored nearly black and I donu2019t feel that this fades the color at all. Very great quality for the price.

reviews.review_title: hair type: fine hair but lots of it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cleansing, light scent (almost nonexistant), great as a daily shampoo. Personally, I do prefer sulfates and feel sls cleans better so I use a sulfate shampoo every few days to get rid of build up. I did not like the matching conditioner for this so I use  a different one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo is amazing, my go-to, when used properly. A lot of the 1 star reviews seem to have a similar pattern (their hair felt dry and dull after). But don't throw it away just yet! I consider this to be a gentle clarifying shampoo.   TIPS for using this shampoo properly: - do not use other products in your hair that contain silicones (silicone build-up will create a barrier and any benefits from this shampoo will be greatly reduced) - pair it with the conditioner! they work beautifully together. - use only a small (tiny) amount and double shampoo. rince, lather - repeat. - wash your hair max twice (maybe three) time a week with this.  This is a great shampoo if you have hard water at home (most of us do) - because it lathers up a lot and has great cleansing properties. It keeps my hair soft, so shiny and weightless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has the typical shampoo scent. However, it cleanses super well, and is a great sister to the conditioner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shampoo mostly because it's color safe and leaves my hair feeling super clean at the same time. This whole line's fragrances aren't powerful, which is great for me because scents tend to overwhelm me.

reviews.review_title: Utter lifesaver for greasy, thin hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have greasy, thin hair and have been on a desperate hunt to help something make my hair look better. This shampoo has been a LIFESAVER. Within a single wash, my hair looked less greasy. It's been over a month since I started using it and my hair has a great shine without being greasy -- to the point where even my hairdresser said she noticed an improvement. On top of it, I appreciate that the scent is on the milder side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am over 50 and my hair is thinner and dryer and frizzier than my younger days. I have been using this for a few  weeks. LOVE it. My hair is soooo soft and shiny and with a bit of life. I almost don't need other products, though I like working a teensy bit of the oil through after I blow dry. More expensive than the drugstore shampoos, but definitely worth it (I will save on money other hair products I no longer need). Also for both shampoo and conditioner, a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo is amazing for my hair.  It rinses really well and my hair feels soft and manageable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for fine hair! Wow. Iu2019ve never used a shampoo that gave me this much volume and helped me go several days without washing. I barely needed dry shampoo.  I really recommend it for anyone with fine, medium to long hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shampoo! I have fine, oily hair and this works great for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am totally obsessed with this shampoo and conditioner after only one use! I have been looking for something super hydrating that made my hair feel soft and this is it!! I have tried so many different brands and hands down this has blown me away. 10/10 would recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo/conditioner combo is a game changer if you have fine hair, but a lot of it. It's so lightweight and yet leaves my hair so clean (I only have to wash it twice a week) and very full after a blowout. I've struggled to find products that give my hair more body, and this is it! I can't rave about it enough.

reviews.review_title: Clean AND soft? I can use it for every shampoo!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually I don't go in for matching shampoo and conditioner, but after sampling this pair, I loved the shampoo just as much as the conditioner, which was a lot!  This leaves my hair clean without stripping or adding damage, and it feels so soft.  It's getting more difficult as I age to shampoo without feeling like I'm damaging fragile hair, but this gets me clean and nourished at the same time.  After using this, my hair feels like I sprayed detangler on it.  For super fine hair, this might be enough, but for my hair, it's the perfect gentle cleanse to work with the magical weightless conditioner.  Best of all, I don't have to juggle multiple shampoos to get color protection one wash, proper cleaning the next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I have think wavy hair and all SH/CD seem to weigh me down. My hair was ultra light and fluffy but not frizzy. Amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after having used the moisture VERB shampoo and conditioner. At first wasn't sure if this was for all hair types or thin hair.. as I have full thick hair, but find when I try to limit my hair washing my hair dries out after a day or two. This stuff is awesome, lathers well, not heavy and makes my hair soft and weightless as advertised. Deducted one star because I wish VERB made more fragrant products. Overall exactly what I paid for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample in my last SEPHORA online order. It was creamy and lathered well. My hair felt clean afterward. That was it. It didn't add any moisture, which I need because I have a natural afro. It's advertised for all hair types, which isn't accurate. I can use a drug store hair brand, such as, Cantu or African Pride, which is my holy grail, that only costs $7 each. If you have Type 3c-4c hair, this will not work for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I also received this shampoo as a gift with purchase- The shampoo and conditioner isn't bad - but the Ghost Oil is very heavy and greasy when applied-  There are many great shampoos on the market- I can not tell the difference from this brand to many others

reviews.review_title: VERB IS MY NEW HOLY GRAIL
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using the Ghost shampoo & conditioner, I purchased the value set with the Ghost Oil and also got the Ghost Prep.  I am 29 years old and have been searching literally my entire life for a shampoo/conditioner that actually does something for my flat, fine and thin hair.  I have wasted ridiculous amounts of money on different hair products but now I can confidently say those days are over.  The Ghost line has brought my hair to LIFE!  The very first time I used it in the evening along with the prep on my damp hair, went to bed and woke up in the morning with mind blowing results.  My hair was softer and cleaner than ever and it actually had BOUNCE and VOLUME!!!  I have been using these products for over a week now and I only grow more impressed each day.  It's such a confidence booster to finally have something that works for me.  Plus it's on the more affordable side which is a bonus and smells amazing!  I went out on a wim trying Verb as it was the first time hearing of this brand, and I am so incredibly happy I took the chance.  I read through lots of reviews before I decided the Ghost products seemed like the right choice for my hair.  I'm excited to try out more of their products but will definitely be sticking with the Ghost shampoo and conditioner! Thank you Verb!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m giving this 4 stars, only because I received samples on the shampoo/conditioner and verb hair oil from Sephora as a free sample with purchase(so I havenu2019t been using it so long as to give a thorough review imo). I have been using it about a week(there were 5+or so packets in my sample). I had never heard of this product. I am a cosmetologist, and have been a hair stylist since 2006. I use the best products, and most high end products I can get and try being a stylist. Iu2019ve got my favorites of course, but decided to get this sample pack since they didnu2019t have a lot to choose from when I ordered online. Iu2019ve been using the ghost shampoo/conditioner and oil since I got it. I was pleasantly surprised at the lovely lather and light smell from the shampoo, and the softness from the conditioner. I use oils like chi silk infusion and bio silk, so I know good oils. Verb oil seems to be a good oil, although I would need to use it longer to be sure. So far when I use the shampoo/conditioner combo my hair seems very soft and less frizzy. (I have very fine straight hair, my hair usually only frizzes due to the Texas humidity). I do get itchy scalp from dry skin, so I donu2019t know if this helps or not. Overall itu2019s a pretty good product, shiny, soft, and less frizz is a good thing. It has some good things, cruelty free, good for colored hair, etc. I hope it keeps working well, as I will possibly add it to my rotation. (For those wondering yes I have a rotation) I switch my products up depending on what I feel my hair needs, and to keep my hair from becoming too used to a single line. Even having 2 different shampoos/conditioners can be helpful for keeping your hair healthy and happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for about 2-3 years now, and I have fine, bleach-processed hair with an oily scalp. This shampoo and conditioner works really well... my hair is generally pretty healthy and my scalp is fairly oily, and my skin everywhere else is super sensitive, and this combo doesnu2019t break me out or make me too greasy. I wash my hair every other day, and rotate a clarifying shampoo and a hair mask once a week, and these products at this price keep me coming back. A big one will last me the better part of a year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Made My Hair Fall Out - contains hydrogen peroxide
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I could give this -1,000,000,000 stars. I don't know if anyone else has had this happen, but this shampoo made my hair fall out. Initially I thought it was stress causing it since I was going through a very stressful time in my life, however when I stopped using this shampoo for a number of days and my hair stopped falling out in clumps in the shower (I mean literal CLUMPS). I'm so upset I didn't realize it sooner but I'm grateful it wasn't worse. My hair is now so thin but after stopping using this shampoo I lose maybe a few strands of hair in the shower like I always had before I started using this product, instead of >50 strands. After scanning the ingredients, I discovered this has hydrogen peroxide which causes major damage to hair and can lead to it falling out. Even though it's far down on the ingredient list, I don't doubt it could cause this reaction. Do yourself a favor and don't bother purchasing this. I immediately threw this product and the conditioner out and switched to a different, natural haircare brand. I've never been so angry with a product's performance.

I asked the Sephora employee for a sample of the Ghost shampoo and I have found the solution to my hair nightmare!  This is a sulfate-free shampoo that actually leaves my hair feeling CLEAN, but NOT like straw!  I now understand that my hair can not tolerate most silicones - they build up heavily and easily on my hair.  I am currently using Garnier Fructis Pure and Clean conditioner, Living Proof Restore Leave-in cream, Aveda Volumizing tonic and Ghost Dry Shampoo for Light Hair.  I will be definitely be purchasing more of this Ghost line!  The scent is fine (I was spoiled by the gorgeous fragrance of Eva NYC) and the price is refreshingly sane (looking at you, Living Proof). reviews.review_text: Itu2019s lightweight but still cleanses. I wish the smell was sweeter cause thatu2019s more my style but it works well. Also for those who claim it is not sulfate free... Is Sodium C14-16 olefin sulfonate a sulfate? The name may be misleading, but sodium C14-16 olefin sulfonate is not a sulfate. Sulfonate is related to but not the same as sulfates. In a sulfonate the sulfur is linked direct to a carbon atom where as a sulfate is linked directly to the carbon chain via an oxygen atom. They do have similar qualities when it comes to propensity of being irritating to the skin but sodium C14-16 olefin sulfonate is not a sulfate.  Sodium C14-16 olefin sulfonate may have a drying effect on oneu2019s scalp and hair but if in need of a strong cleanser to remove buildup or dirt, then this agent may be the one for you. It is a safe and excellent surfactant to use.  Just because it says u201cSulfu201d in the name doesnu2019t automatically make it a sulfate. If you are avoiding sulfates, know why you are avoiding them and what you are looking to get out of a shampoo.
